problem_text: Use rectangle L M N P, parallelogram L K M J to solve the problem. If m \angle M J N = 35, find m \angle M P N.
compact_text: Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem. If m \angle MJN = 35, find m \angle MPN.
annotat_text:
Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem.
If $m \angle M J N=35,$ find $m \angle M P N$
